hook.text: A tip line receives a call: the CFO is cooking the books. The caller? Nobody knows. That's the point.

buildup.text: Anonymous hotlines and reporting platforms let employees flag misconduct without revealing their identity.

discovery.text: ACFE data shows tips detect 43% of corporate fraudâ€”more than audits, management review, or any other method.

twist.text: But anonymity has limits. Small teams can guess who reported. Some companies even use tip lines to find dissenters.

climax.text: The best systems use third-party operators, encrypted channels, and anti-retaliation audits to protect callers.

punchline.text: The best fraud detector isn't software. It's a safe phone line.
